Address.label: Address
Address.value: 337 MAGNA DRIVE, AURORA, Ontario, L4G 7K1, Canada

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Magna International prides itself on a highly entrepreneurial culture and a corporate constitution that outlines distribution of profits to various stakeholders. This automotive supplier's product groups include exteriors, interiors, seating, roof systems, body and chassis, powertrain, vision and electronic systems, closure systems, electric vehicle systems, tooling and engineering, and contracted vehicle assembly. Roughly 46% of Magna's revenue comes from North America while Europe accounts for approximately 43%.

value.name: Boris Shulkin
value.title: Executive VP, Chief Digital & Information Officer
